titleStmt.title: A sermon preached upon the thirtieth of January, 1694/5, in the parish of S. in the county of Norfolk by Samuel Snowden ...
titleStmt.author: Iraeneus, junior.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Heptinstall for Edward Giles, bookseller in Norwich ...,

notesStmt.note: Iraeneus, junior, is a pseudonym of Samuel Snowden.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
